name: Moth (Minimanismo)
description:
Three surreal short stories with four slightly different endings.

This story shares the same universe with my other games. To get a better understanding, you should probably play them.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Disclaimer Warning

The story is purely fiction. None of it is real.

This game contains disturbing, unsettling imagery and depression themes, death, family issues, monsters, and a suspicious apple pie.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Notes:

  • This is a linear story.
  • 20min/1h to complete the game.
  • All the pictures in the game are mine.
  • Thank you for playing.
  • I'm still learning  how to use Renpy.
  • English isn't my first language. If I did any errors, tell me and I will correct it, please :)

Made with Renpy.
